name: Fishing?
description:
A short atmospheric horror game I'm working on revolving around fishing. It's extremely early on in development, and currently there's no endpoint or goal, the map is heavily unfinished and mishmashed, and there isn't really much that can happen.

Sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com

Music composed by AIVA - Artificial Intelligence Virtual Artist (https://www.aiva.ai)
